price: (36) And We said, "Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs." Then We destroyed them with [complete] destruction.
arabic: فَقُلۡنَا ٱذۡهَبَآ إِلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَدَمَّرۡنَٰهُمۡ تَدۡمِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: faqul'nā idh'habā ilā al-qawmi alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā fadammarnāhum tadmīran
